rules.name: Veteran Adventurer
rules.text: In the Ready step of each Strategy phase after the first, if this operative isn’t within control range of enemy operatives, you gain 1 Resourceful point.

rules.name: Outright Conviction
rules.text: The first time this operative would be incapacitated during the battle, it’s not incapacitated, has 1 wound remaining and cannot be incapacitated for the remainder of the action. All remaining attack dice are discarded.

rules.name: Stalker
rules.text: This operative can perform the Charge action while it has a Conceal order.

rules.name: Irrepressible Hardiness
rules.text: If this operative is incapacitated during the Fight action, you can strike the enemy operative in that sequence with one of your unresolved successes before this operative is removed from the killzone.

rules.name: Wroughtlock Negotiation
rules.text: STRATEGIC GAMBIT. This operative can immediately perform a free Shoot action (you can change its order to Engage to do so).

rules.name: Brazen Killer
rules.text: Whenever this operative incapacitates an enemy operative with its wroughtlock revolvers, roll one D6 separately for each other enemy operative visible to and within 2" of that enemy operative: if the result is higher than that other enemy operative’s APL stat, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of its next activation.

rules.name: Bipod
rules.text: Whenever this operative is shooting with an APM launcher, if it hasn’t moved during the activation, or if it’s a counteraction, that weapon has the Ceaseless weapon rule.

rules.name: Minefield
rules.text: You have five Minefield markers. Three are HY-Pex mines and two are blank. Set them up reverse-side down as if one item of equipment, each >2" from other markers/access points/Accessible terrain, and >6" from opponent’s drop zone and your other Minefield markers. When this operative is readied, if not within control range of enemy operatives, you can reset (flip back) one flipped Minefield marker within its control range.

rules.name: HY-Pex Mines
rules.text: Whenever one of your reverse-side down Minefield markers is within an enemy operative’s control range and not within a friendly Hernkyn Yaegir’s control range, flip it. If blank: no effect. If HY-Pex mine: inflict 3 damage, then roll 1D6; if result is less than that enemy’s Save stat, inflict additional damage equal to the dice result; regardless, if it isn’t incapacitated, end its action (if any). That marker isn’t removed.

weapons.name: Magna-coil rifle (concealed)
weapons.wr: Devastating 3, Heavy, Piercing 1, Silent, Concealed Position

rules.name: Concealed Position
rules.text: This operative can only use Magna-coil rifle (concealed) the first time it performs the Shoot action during the battle.

rules.name: Weavewërke Cloak
rules.text: Whenever an operative is shooting this operative: ignore Saturate; if you can retain any cover saves, you can retain one additional cover save, or retain one cover save as a critical success instead (not cumulative with improved cover saves from Vantage).

rules.name: Pan Spectral Visor
rules.text: Whenever this operative is shooting an operative within 6" of it: its weapons have Seek Light; that operative cannot be obscured.

rules.name: Tracker
rules.text: Whenever this operative is shooting against or fighting against an expended operative within 6" of it, its weapons have Punishing.

rules.name: Intrepid
rules.text: Whenever you spend a Resourceful point for this operative, the following take precedence: if you add 1 to its APL stat, it lasts until the start of its next activation instead; if it regains lost wounds, it regains up to 4 instead.
